column5: Indeed, also a beautiful area. I posted a report a couple years back fishing lakers on Keuka Lake

I fished the catskills last week and thought id throw up some pics of my few days there. We got lucky and came in just as the water was shaping up from high and dirty conditions.  We mainly fished the hatches coming off the Beaverkill and Willowemoc. This was all dry flies, and as always.....thats an absolute blast.  Youll see some of the fishy pics, scenery pics, and some pics from the small town in the catskills that we stayed. Youll see covered bridges, the fly fishing museum, and a couple of the small fly shops in town. Which by the way, there are many.....
nice pics
nice browns!
Nice.  after see the bridge pic's I keep looking for this to happen.
Great pics, looks like you had some good fishing.  Dan
Oh man, this probably my fav report yet for 2011!!!!!   Just awesome!!  I should make use of my NYS license more often, lol
B-E-A-U-tiful!! That looks like an awesome trip. Thanks for sharing.
Dang! a very pretty province!
Beautiful stuff there....looks like an amazing trip!  LOL @ OhioFisherman....New York State looks so good that it's now considered a province, eh?

We did pretty well......we went thru stints of fish after fish. And also went thru lulls as well.....even when watching fish rising all around us lol. I cant tell you how many times i had a fish rise, slash what looked like my fly....only to find out he refused it at the last minute and i was settin the hook on a fake take lol.
awesome fishing trip !!! very nice scenery too,thanks for sharing !! some very nice trout as well...

You definitely should make the trip Bill. Cameras dont do it justice......and its like disney world, i didnt get to see half the water i wanted to in the few days i was there. I wanted to get on the east and west branches of the Delaware but just didnt have the time.
Nice
I'm going to add it to the list man, that just looks unbelievably good.  All those browns on dries?  I think I'd be in heaven!  I'll drop you a PM with a few questions

Heck Johnny I made it east of Buffalo and the peace bridge for the first time last year on the way to Providence RI to rescue my daughter, Eastern New York State and even parts of western New York are very nice! Always want to head up to Lake Champlain, but I could catch 5-6 pound bass here, and for the scenery? Ontario had it beat.
beautiful area and beautiful fish too
Nice !!!! I bet there is'nt one memmer here who isn't jealous of that trip.It relaxed me just looking at those scenic pics. Thanks for the report!  Paul
Your pictures are amazing. Great report and fish. Thanks Blaque
a picture says a thousand words... this report says i missed one helluva nice trip..
awesome pictures and fish
Glad you guys liked the pics.
Nice to see some of the American covered bridges.
Looks like you have green thumb after all.... for taken pics    Nice browns
lol, thanks leechman
Great pictures, nice to see you had a good time. We made a trip years ago to the finger lakes area and remember the scenery was beautiful there also.
